title: Greenbelt Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved          NPS Centennial- Celebrate the National Park Service's 100th Birthday in this area or parks across the country.          Volunteer- There are many opportunities to help Greenbelt Park.   Campground Host  Invasive Plant Removal  Volunteer Trail Crew  Special Events throughout the year   Current Opportunities are listed on the bottom of the page- Click on the opportunity and apply.         The National Park Foundation is the official charity of America’s national parks. Funds contributed to the Foundation are invested directly into the national parks of the United States.  National Park Foundation       Current Volunteer Opportunities
